<Folder>

<G3>96.2</G3>
<tut1>94.4</tut1>
<G4>0</G4>
<G5>95.2</G5>

</Folder>

import requests
from datagaps_utilities import xml_to_rdb
url="https://www.dataaccess.com/webservicesserver/TextCasing.wso"
input_data="""<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<soap12:Envelope xmlns:soap12="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope">
  <soap12:Body>
    <InvertStringCase xmlns="http://www.dataaccess.com/webservicesserver/">
      <sAString>AbCdE</sAString>
    </InvertStringCase>
  </soap12:Body>
</soap12:Envelope>"""
response=requests.post(url,data=input_data)
xml_to_rdb(session_object=spark, data=response.text, use_short_names=True,component_name="API XML response to relational datasets", encoding="utf-8", skip_one_to_one_relation=True, dataflow_run_id=$[dataflow_run_id], dataflow_id="$[dataflow_id]")","kind":"pyspark","dataSourceId":0,"componentId":10,"componentName":"API XML response to relational datasets","description":"","tableName":"","category":"Processor","componentType":"Code","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"","displayRows":50,"dependencies":[],"options":{},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.CodeComponent","executionOption":"allparentpassorfail","excludeNotification":"N"},{"code":"
